title.narrative: IFC Sustainable Hydropower in the Mekong Countries

description.narrative: Funding under this initiative aims to improve environmental and social standards for water resources development in the Mekong region through the provision of grant funding of AUD 8 million over a period of 2014-2019 to the International Finance Cooperation to work with the government of Laos and Myanmar to improve laws and regulations contributing to better governance of the water resources development in these countries. The program also works with private sector investing in water infrastructure development to better adhere social and environmental standards for water investments. This includes providing technical support and active encouragement for adoption of higher environmental and social standards.
